column5: I'll be passing through the Thousands Islands this Sat. Does the prohibition on transporting > 120 / person apply here too? Do they strongly enforce this provision? Thanks to all.

I cross there twice a year with my boat in tow. Very rarely am I ever asked about bait. When it is, it's usually about worms and dirt. Hate to see you lose extra bait, but if they don't ask, don't tell.
